headline: GTA Online
subtitle: HVY Insurgent Pick-Up Custom
content: Every self-respecting warlord in Los Santos is familiar with that delicious cocktail of unstoppable momentum, super-heavy armor and .50 cal magic you can only get from the HVY Insurgent. Well, get ready for a brand new sting in the tail: once you own a Mobile Operations Center with a Vehicle Workshop, and youâ€™ve done the necessary research back at base,  you can replace the .50 cal with a minigun, and throw on some unique armor mods.
